title: install toolbars
extract: Open Internet Explorer.To see the menu, press Alt.Click Tools Manage Add-ons.Select Google Toolbar, Google Toolbar Helper.Click Enable.Click Close.
extract_html:
1. Open Internet Explorer.
  2. To see the menu, press Alt.
  3. Click Tools Manage Add-ons.
  4. Select Google Toolbar, Google Toolbar Helper.
  5. Click Enable.
  6. Click Close.
